injuries.content: 20220815 Los Angeles Angels: CF Alex Aristy was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: knee inflammation. He's expected to miss about 3 weeks. 20220817 Tampa Bay Rays: Zack Weiss diagnosed with a strained hamstring, will miss 4 weeks. 20220817 Colorado Rockies: RF Eddie Hoffman was injured being hit by a pitch. The Diagnosis: bruised knee. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 5 days. 20220817 Minnesota Twins: 1B Nick Castellanos was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: sprained ankle. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 5 days. 20220818 Philadelphia Phillies: RP Albert V?zquez was injured while racing his teammate during practice. The Diagnosis: intercostal strain. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220818 Los Angeles Angels: SP Ernesto Logo was injured while racing his teammate on the highway. The Diagnosis: sprained wrist. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220818 Oakland Athletics: 2B Alfredo D?vila was injured in a collision at a base. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220818 Oakland Athletics: C Buster Posey was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: sprained thumb. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220819 Oakland Athletics: Alfredo D?vila diagnosed with a torn labrum, will miss 4-5 months. 20220819 Chicago White Sox: SP Jake Arrieta was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: mild shoulder strain. He's expected to miss about 1-2 weeks. 20220819 St. Louis Cardinals: SS Jurickson Profar was injured in a collision at a base. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220819 Cincinnati Reds: SS J.P. Crawford was injured in a collision at a base. The Diagnosis: knee contusion. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220819 Cincinnati Reds: SP Keegan Thompson was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220819 Cincinnati Reds: 3B Chia-Jung Liang was injured being hit by a pitch. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220819 San Diego Padres: RF Curtis Whitten was injured being hit by a pitch. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220819 Oakland Athletics: SS Didi Gregorius was injured while running the bases. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220820 Oakland Athletics: Didi Gregorius diagnosed with a fractured knee, will miss 5 months. 20220820 St. Louis Cardinals: Jurickson Profar diagnosed with a sprained ankle, will miss 3-4 weeks. 20220820 Cincinnati Reds: CL Kelvin Herrera was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220820 Cincinnati Reds: RP Bob Pennington was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: oblique strain. He's expected to miss about 4 weeks. 20220820 Miami Marlins: CF Kevin Collard was injured being hit by a pitch. The Diagnosis: foot contusion. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220821 Cincinnati Reds: Keegan Thompson diagnosed with shoulder inflammation, will miss 8 weeks. 20220821 Cincinnati Reds: Chia-Jung Liang diagnosed with a fractured finger, will miss 4-5 weeks. 20220821 Seattle Mariners: RP Mayckol Guaipe was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: shoulder soreness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days. 20220822 Baltimore Orioles: SP Cristo Reyes was injured . The Diagnosis: flu. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220822 San Diego Padres: Curtis Whitten diagnosed with a fractured thumb, will miss 3 weeks.

news.content: 20220815 Tampa Bay Rays: A.J. Reed got suspended 4 games after ejection following arguing a strike call. 20220818 Houston Astros: Mark Appel pitches a 2-hit shutout against the Los Angeles Angels with 8 strikeouts and 0 BB allowed! 20220818 Colorado Rockies: Spencer Taylor got suspended 3 games after ejection following a brawl. 20220818 Miami Marlins: Jake Ehret got suspended 3 games after ejection following a brawl. 20220821 Toronto Blue Jays: Forrest Wall hits three home runs against the Tampa Bay Rays, going 4-4 with 6 RBI and 4 runs scored! 20220822 SS Xander Bogaerts of the Boston Red Sox honored: Wins the MLB AL Player of the Week Award. 20220822 SS Wilmer Difo of the Cincinnati Reds honored: Wins the MLB NL Player of the Week Award.
